channel.title: GUI Questions
channel.description:
[ul][li][b]Question 1.[/b] How do i make a list that drops down like then menu on a internet browser and other things the file menu or edit?[/li] [li][b]Question 2.[/b] How do i add a background to the GUI?[/li][/ul]
[ul][li][b]Question 3.[/b]What is a combo box and how do i add things in it?[/li][/ul]

item.title: GUI Questions
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“the angel of death, post:1, topic:136298”][ul][li]Question 1. How do i make a list that drops down like then menu on a internet browser and other things the file menu or edit?[/li]
[li]Question 2. How do i add a background to the GUI?[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Question 3.What is a combo box and how do i add things in it?[/li][/ul][/quote]

  1. MenuBar. And add menus just like you add combos.

  2. Umm not 100% sure what you mean there

JComboBox cbox1 = new JComboBox("Select");

this.add(cbox1);

JCombo c1 = new JCombo("First option");

cbox1.add(c1)

Read full topic

item.title: GUI Questions
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“moparsc4p3, post:6, topic:136298”][quote author=the angel of death link=topic=187798.msg1695996#msg1695996 date=1187924680]

Bullshit.

  1. http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&safe=off&sa=X&oi=spell&resnum=0&ct=result&cd=1&q=java+drop+down+list&spell=1
    I found a source that’d have it.

  2. http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&safe=off&q=adding+a+background+to+a+gui+java&btnG=Search
    Most definitely something in there.

  3. http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&safe=off&q=java+combo+box&btnG=Search
    First thing that comes up.

Thanks :).
[/quote]
So you didn’t google o.0[/quote]
Says you.

Read full topic
